===================================== Prepare the nmr output for statistics =====================================
----------- Description -----------
| This module creates peak, meta data and sample matrix which can be inputed into univeriate and multivariate nodes.
----------- Input files -----------
+------------------------------+------------+ | File | Format | +==============================+============+ | 1) NMR data matrix | txt | | | | +------------------------------+------------+ | 2) Factor Json | json | | | | +------------------------------+------------+
---------- Parameters ----------
Input NMR data matrix | Aligned NMR data matrix (CSV format) |
Factor Json | Json file from get_study_json node |
------------ Output files ------------
outputPeakTableOut | A tabular peak table containing abundances |
outputMetaDataOut | Sample metadata |
outputVariablesOut | Variable data containing identification. | ---------------------------------------------------
